casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joshua Ryan WILSON 466A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 27, 2017 Leslie C. Rawls, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Wilson, Joshua Ryan. Marie Hartwell Evitt, Attorney at Law, Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of February 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of February 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 15th day of March 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
